## Problem 2.

```{r}
sst_clean <- sst |> #use the sst data frame
  clean_names() |> #clean up the column names
  mutate(
    date = ymd(date), #making sure the date is read as a date
    year = year(date), #making the year a category
    month = month(date),#making the month category
    month_name = case_match(
      month,
      1 ~ "Jan",
      2 ~ "Feb",
      3 ~ "Mar",
      4 ~ "Apr",
      5 ~ "May",
      6 ~ "Jun",
      7 ~ "Jul",
      8 ~ "Aug",
      9 ~ "Sep",
      10 ~ "Oct",
      11 ~ "Nov",
      12 ~ "Dec"
    ),
    month_name = as_factor(month.name),
    month_name = fct_relevel(month_name, month.abb)
    ) |> 
  group_by(year, month) |> #grouping by year and month
  summarize(mean_monthly_sst = mean(temp, na.rm = TRUE), 
    .groups = "drop"                # ungroup after summarize
  )
  
  



```
